tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE email_marketing (
  campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  email_address VARCHAR(255),
  open_status BOOLEAN,
  click_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE email_campaigns (
  campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date TIMESTAMP,
  end_date TIMESTAMP,
  total_recipients INT
);

CREATE TABLE customer_engagement (
  engagement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  customer_id INT,
  open_status BOOLEAN,
  click_status BOOLEAN,
  conversion_status BOOLEAN,
  engagement_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES email_campaigns(campaign_id)
);

CREATE TABLE email_campaigns ( campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY, campaign_name VARCHAR(255), campaign_type VARCHAR(50), start_date TIMESTAMP, end_date TIMESTAMP, total_recipients INT, total_opened INT, total_clicked INT );
CREATE TABLE customer_engagement ( customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, email VARCHAR(255), first_name VARCHAR(50), last_name VARCHAR(50) );
CREATE TABLE email_clicks ( click_id INT PRIMARY KEY, campaign_id INT, customer_id INT, click_timestamp TIMESTAMP );

CREATE TABLE email_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date TIMESTAMP,
    end_date TIMESTAMP,
    target_audience TEXT,
    success_rate DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE email_recipients (
    recipient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    email_address VARCHAR(255),
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    subscription_date DATE,
    subscription_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE email_clicks (
    click_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    recipient_id INT,
    click_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    clicked_url VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE email_conversions (
    conversion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    click_id INT,
    conversion_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    conversion_value DECIMAL,
    conversion_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE email_contacts (
    contact_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    email_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    date_subscribed TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE email_campaigns (
    campaign_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    target_audience VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE email_interactions (
    interaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    contact_id INT REFERENCES email_contacts(contact_id),
    campaign_id INT REFERENCES email_campaigns(campaign_id),
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP
);
